PHRASE.LANG: This is a reward from Ultra Fast Back To School Dash. A speed boost will automatically engage when moving at full running speed. [#Legal]
Il s'agit d'une récompense d'Ultra Fast Back to School Dash. Un turbo s'active automatiquement lors d'une course à pleine vitesse. [#Legal]
This is a reward from Ultra Fast Back To School Dash. A speed boost will automatically engage when moving at full running speed. [#Legal]
